page.title: 19BOARDING KENNELS
page.content: My name is{Daniel Shield}and I'm eleven years old.I used to live in Sadberge,but now I have moved to {Hurworth}which is a village 7 miles away.About a year after we had moved we set up{boarding kennels}for dogs.(And we also will look after {cats.)}My mum runs the business and my dad works as an agricultural supplier. We have enough kennels for 10 dogs.With only having a few my mam can give each dog a lot of attention and care.we have a two and a half acre field which the dogs get walked around 3 or 4 times a day.The dogs get fed any food that the owner wants.My mam usually feeds the the dogs at about 6.oo p.m.It costs around{Â£2}a day to keep a dog in the kennels.I hope this business lasts a long time. BY DANIEL SHIELD.
